body_html: If it helps, a better version of isaac is out: https://github.com/ptillet/isaac, and provides significant speed-ups over clBLAS and cuBLAS on Maxwell, Pascal and Fiji. Also provides faster (input-aware) kernels than Tensorflow for 1D and 2D reductions.
body_text: If it helps, a better version of isaac is out: https://github.com/ptillet/isaac, and provides significant speed-ups over clBLAS and cuBLAS on Maxwell, Pascal and Fiji. Also provides faster (input-aware) kernels than Tensorflow for 1D and 2D reductions.
body: If it helps, a better version of isaac is out: https://github.com/ptillet/isaac, and provides significant speed-ups over clBLAS and cuBLAS on Maxwell, Pascal and Fiji. Also provides faster (input-aware) kernels than Tensorflow for 1D and 2D reductions.
